title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: In the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? method, the output is "MySomeClass", but it is expected to be "MySomeAnn".
OB: The current output of the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? method is "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected output of the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? method is "MySomeAnn".
